title: Dua After Adhan
bangla: Allahumma rabba hadhihid-da‘watit-tammah, was-salatil-qa'imah, ati Muhammadanil-wasilata wal-fadilah, wab‘ath-hu maqaman mahmudanilladhi wa‘adtahu.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ هَذِهِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّامَّةِ وَالصَّلَاةِ الْقَائِمَةِ آتِ مُحَمَّدًا الْوَسِيلَةَ وَالْفَضِيلَةَ وَابْعَثْهُ مَقَامًا مَحْمُودًا الَّذِي وَعَدْتَهُ
transliteration: Allahumma rabba hadhihid-da‘watit-tammah, was-salatil-qa'imah, ati Muhammadanil-wasilata wal-fadilah, wab‘ath-hu maqaman mahmudanilladhi wa‘adtahu.
meaning: O Allah! Lord of this perfect call and the established prayer, grant Muhammad (peace be upon him) the intercession and excellence, and raise him to the honored station that You have promised him.

title: Dua Before Wudu
meaning: In the name of Allah (I begin the ablution).
